instructions.name: PUSH_BOOL_TRUE
instructions.description: Pushes a boolean true onto the stack.

instructions.name: PUSH_BOOL_FALSE
instructions.description: Pushes a boolean false onto the stack.

instructions.name: PUSH_I32_LITERAL
instructions.description: Pushes an integer onto the stack.

instructions.name: PUSH_I32_STACK
instructions.description: Pushes an integer from the stack onto the stack.

instructions.name: ADD_I32
instructions.description: Pops the top two i32 values off of the stack and pushes the result of adding them back onto the stack.

instructions.name: SUB_I32
instructions.description: Pops the top two i32 values off of the stack and pushes the result of subtracting them back onto the stack.

instructions.name: MUL_I32
instructions.description: Pops the top two i32 values off of the stack and pushes the result of multiplying them back onto the stack.

instructions.name: DIV_I32
instructions.description: Pops the top two i32 values off of the stack and pushes the result of dividing them back onto the stack.

instructions.name: MOD_I32
instructions.description: Pops the top two i32 values off of the stack and pushes the modulus result back onto the stack.

instructions.name: POW_I32
instructions.description: Pops the top two i32 values off of the stack and pushes the result of raising the first value to the power of the second back onto the stack.

instructions.name: PRINT_I32
instructions.description: Prints the integer on the top of stack and removes that item off of the stack.

instructions.name: PRINTLN
instructions.description: Prints a newline and leaves the stack intact.
